title: User Signup with Valid Data
description: Verify that a new user can successfully create an account using valid signup details via Supabase Auth.

steps.description: Navigate to the signup page.
Enter valid new user credentials (email, password, username).
Submit the signup form.
Confirm user account is created and user is redirected to the dashboard.

title: Login with Correct Credentials
description: Ensure that users can login successfully using valid registered email and password.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Input registered username/email and correct password.
Click on the login button.
Verify successful login and access to user dashboard and features according to subscription.

title: Login with Incorrect Password
description: Verify the application behavior when user inputs correct email but incorrect password.

steps.description: Navigate to login page.
Input correct email and incorrect password.
Attempt to login.
Confirm login failure and display of appropriate error message.

title: Password Recovery Flow
description: Test password recovery using the password reset feature integrated with Supabase.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Click on the 'Forgot password' link.
Submit the registered email for password reset.
Verify a password reset email is received and instructions allow resetting the password successfully.

title: Access Control by Subscription Plan
description: Verify that users only have access to features appropriate to their subscription plan (Free, Basic, Business, Premium).

steps.description: Login as a Free plan user.
Verify access to only manual operational entries and limited AI features; no WhatsApp automation.
Login as a Business plan user.
Verify access to WhatsApp AI agents for automation of finance, marketing, scheduling, etc.
Login as a Premium user.
Verify access to advanced AI agents, backup features, and higher tier support.

title: Record Financial Entry with Valid Data
description: Ensure that Business and Premium users can record financial entries properly with correct categorization and validation.

steps.description: Login as a Business or Premium user.
Navigate to the financial management page.
Input a new financial entry: amount, category, description, date.
Submit the entry.
Verify the new entry is recorded, categorized correctly, and visible in the dashboard.

title: Prevent Duplicate Financial Entry
description: Verify that the system identifies and warns users when attempting to create a duplicate financial entry.

steps.description: Create a financial entry with specific details.
Attempt to create another entry with the same details (amount, category, date, description).
Verify that the system displays a duplicate warning and prevents the creation of the entry.

title: Export Financial Data in Paid Plans
description: Verify that users on paid plans can export financial data in CSV, PDF, and JSON formats correctly.

steps.description: Login as a Basic, Business, or Premium user.
Navigate to the reports or financial export section.
Select export format (CSV, PDF, JSON) and initiate export.
Verify that the export file matches the selected format and contains correct data.

title: Automated Financial Record via WhatsApp AI Agents
description: Verify that Business and Premium users can interact with AI agents on WhatsApp to record financial transactions using natural language.

steps.description: Use WhatsApp to send a natural language command to record a financial entry (e.g., 'Add expense 50 BRL for marketing yesterday').
Verify the AI agent confirms record creation and the entry appears in the user's financial dashboard.

title: Google Workspace Scheduling Integration
description: Ensure that Business and Premium plans can create, edit, and sync calendar events through AI agents integrated with Google Workspace.

steps.description: Authenticate Business or Premium user with Google Workspace calendar integration.
Use WhatsApp AI agent to schedule a meeting by natural language input.
Verify that the scheduled event appears on Google Calendar and in the app's agenda interface.
Modify an existing event via AI agent command.
Confirm updated event data is synced correctly to Google Calendar.

title: Notification Delivery via WhatsApp and In-App
description: Verify that notifications and alerts are delivered properly in the app and through WhatsApp API as per user subscription and event triggers.

steps.description: Trigger a notification event (e.g., upcoming bill due, new support ticket update) for a user.
Verify the notification is displayed correctly in the app notification menu.
Verify user receives the corresponding WhatsApp message notification if plan supports it.

title: Support Ticket Creation and Tracking
description: Test the support system for ticket creation, status tracking, and role-level security appropriate to the user's subscription.

steps.description: Login as Business or Premium user.
Create a new support ticket with description and priority.
Verify the ticket appears in the user's support ticket list with correct status.
Update ticket status and add comments.
Confirm updated status and comments are visible only to authorized users.

title: Daily Backup and Restore on Premium Plan
description: Validate that Premium users have daily off-site backups and can restore data reliably.

steps.description: Login as Premium plan user.
Trigger or wait for daily backup process.
Verify backup completed successfully and logs record backup status.
Perform a restore operation from backup.
Verify data restored matches backup contents and integrity is preserved.

title: User Profile Update and Avatar Upload
description: Test ability of users to update profile information including uploading and changing avatar image.

steps.description: Navigate to user profile page.
Edit profile fields like name, email, and preferences.
Upload a new avatar image and save changes.
Verify details are saved and avatar is updated and displayed properly.

title: Data Privacy Compliance and Opt-Out Management
description: Ensure user data handling complies with LGPD; users can manage privacy settings and opt-out preferences.

steps.description: Access privacy settings section.
Adjust privacy preferences and opt-out from data usage.
Verify that changes take immediate effect and data processing reflects user preferences.

title: PWA Functionality and Offline Access
description: Test the Progressive Web App support including offline usage and service worker registration.

steps.description: Install the PWA version of the application.
Use key features in an offline state (without network).
Verify application works gracefully offline with cached data and syncs changes when online.

title: AI Agents Web Search and Scraping Compliance
description: Verify AI agents perform web search and scraping only on authorized sources and APIs in compliance with regulations.

steps.description: Trigger AI agent to perform web search and data scraping requests.
Verify that AI agents do not scrape unauthorized sources and respect API limits.
Confirm logging of scraping actions for audit and compliance.

title: Role-Based Access Control Enforcement
description: Test that role-level security policies prevent unauthorized users from accessing restricted data and features.

steps.description: Login with a user account of limited permission.
Attempt to access features or data reserved for higher-tier plans or different users.
Verify access is denied and appropriate error or redirect is shown.

title: Financial Goal Tracking and Alerts
description: Validate creation of financial goals, progress tracking, and alert generation on goal milestones or failures.

steps.description: Create a new financial goal with target amount and deadline.
Record financial transactions affecting the goal.
Verify goal progress updates and alerts are generated as expected.

title: Robustness of Drag-and-Drop in Calendar and Tasks
description: Test the drag-and-drop functionality in calendar event management and tasks prioritization for edge cases.

steps.description: Attempt to drag events across different calendar views (day, week, month) and drop to valid/invalid dates.
Verify events update correctly when dropped in valid areas and reject invalid drops gracefully.
Drag and reorder tasks with various status and priorities.
Confirm tasks reorder properly, status and priority updates persist.
